title: Europes top privacy watchdog calls on firms to curb U.S. data transfers
text:
Europe's top privacy watchdog calls on firms to curb U.S. data transfers 
Reuters Top News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
BRUSSELS Europe's top data privacy watchdog called on firms to limit transfers of Europeans' personal data to the United States, sounding a warning after a court struck down a pact between the regions over concerns about U.S. government surveillance....
